original_data.Title: Product Manager Interview Preparation
original_data.Short Intro: Prove your qualifications in your Product Manager interviews, and watch experienced Product Managers go through mock strategy and technical interviews, as well as share insights about the PM interview process.
original_data.Prequisites: This course is ideal for anyone looking to upgrade their PM interviewing skills or break into the Product Management field, and learn best practices for Product Management interviews. There are no technical prerequisites for this course.See the Technology Requirements for using Udacity.

unified_data.title: Product Manager Interview Preparation
unified_data.description: Prove your qualifications in your Product Manager interviews, and watch experienced Product Managers go through mock strategy and technical interviews, as well as share insights about the PM interview process.
learning_outcomes: Learn how to effectively structure your responses to Product Management interview questions.
Evaluate product performance and identify areas for improvement based on relevant metrics.
Understand the key skills and abilities that impress Product Management hiring managers.
Understand how to prepare effectively for different types of Product Management interviews.
Practice answering common product strategy questions in a mock interview setting.
Apply strategic frameworks to justify product decisions during case interview questions.

original_data.Title: Microsoft Power Platform
original_data.Short Intro: Build powerful business apps with Microsoft Power Platform.
original_data.Prequisites:
No prior knowledge of Microsoft Power Platform or other Microsoft products  is required. Anyone who is interested in building apps with no prior programming experience can take this course.
See the Technology Requirements for using Udacity.
original_data.What you learn: Creating your First App with Power AppsExplore what Power Apps is and how it can be usedGenerate a simple Power App with the template galleryDeploy your first Power AppExplore what Power Apps is and how it can be usedGenerate a simple Power App with the template galleryDeploy your first Power AppApp DevelopmentIdentify a business problemDesign an Inventory Tracking AppCreate a functional page one of a Canvas AppUse a datastore to implement app functionalityIdentify a business problemDesign an Inventory Tracking AppCreate a functional page one of a Canvas AppUse a datastore to implement app functionalityUsing Power AutomateExplain Power Automate and FlowsUse triggers to begin a flow processUse Data ConnectorsExplain Power Automate and FlowsUse triggers to begin a flow processUse Data ConnectorsAI BuilderEvaluate use cases for AI BuilderUse a prebuilt AI Builder model in a Power AppImplement the AI Builder model for Object Recognition inside an AppEvaluate use cases for AI BuilderUse a prebuilt AI Builder model in a Power AppImplement the AI Builder model for Object Recognition inside an App

unified_data.title: Microsoft Power Platform
unified_data.description: Build powerful business apps with Microsoft Power Platform.
learning_outcomes: Integrate AI Builder models into Power Apps for enhanced functionality.
Identify business problems and design Power Platform solutions to address them.
Create functional applications using Microsoft Power Apps.
Utilize data connectors to connect Power Platform applications to various data sources.
Design and implement automated workflows using Power Automate.
Develop canvas apps with multiple pages and data integration.

original_data.Title: AI Fundamentals
original_data.Short Intro: Learn the AI skills top companies are looking for.
original_data.Prequisites:
No prior experience with ML or AI is required, but a student taking this course should already:

Be familiar with basic concepts of linear algebra, probability and statistics
Be familiar with basic Python
Have experience setting up Azure compute resources (recommended but not required)
Understand basic programming skills, such as writing conditional and loop statements in any language, preferably Python
Have basic statistics knowledge, such as calculating standard deviation and using linear regression methods
Have basic knowledge of machine learning (recommended but not required)

See the Technology Requirements for using Udacity.
original_data.What you learn: Introduction to AI Fundamentals with AzureMeet your instructors, get an overview of the course, check out the prerequisites and get an introduction to the development of AI and ML.Meet your instructors, get an overview of the course, check out the prerequisites and get an introduction to the development of AI and ML.AI and ML Core ConceptsReview the key terms and concepts related to artificial intelligence and machine learning, including responsible AI and responsible ML.Review the key terms and concepts related to artificial intelligence and machine learning, including responsible AI and responsible ML.Machine LearningTrain and evaluate models using Azure Machine Learning, using its automated machine learning capabilities as well as the Azure Machine Learning designer.Train and evaluate models using Azure Machine Learning, using its automated machine learning capabilities as well as the Azure Machine Learning designer.Computer VisionUse Azure Cognitive Services to handle key workloads in computer vision: object detection, image classification, face detection, text analysis and processing forms.Use Azure Cognitive Services to handle key workloads in computer vision: object detection, image classification, face detection, text analysis and processing forms.Natural Language ProcessingAnalyze text and speech for intent and translate text and speech between languages.Analyze text and speech for intent and translate text and speech between languages.Conversational AICreate a knowledge base in question-and-answer format and create a bot based off of that knowledge base.Create a knowledge base in question-and-answer format and create a bot based off of that knowledge base.

unified_data.title: AI Fundamentals
unified_data.description: Learn the AI skills top companies are looking for.
learning_outcomes: Employ Azure Cognitive Services for computer vision workloads
Utilize Azure Machine Learning to train and evaluate machine learning models
Describe Responsible AI and Responsible ML principles
Design machine learning pipelines using Azure Machine Learning designer
